thread.title: Former Irish Open runner up dies after 'shooting himself in front of his wife'
thread.title_full: Former Irish Open runner up dies after 'shooting himself in front of his wife'

title: Former Irish Open runner up dies after 'shooting himself in front of his wife'
text: Former Irish Open runner up dies after 'shooting himself in front of his wife' Independent.ie Two-time European Tour winner and Irish Open runner up Wayne Westner has died in a suspected suicide in South Africa, local police said on Wednesday. http://www.independent.ie/sport/golf/former-irish-open-runner-up-dies-after-shooting-himself-in-front-of-his-wife-35342587.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35342586.ece/ad908/AUTOCROP/h342/wayne.jpg DUBAI, UNITED ARAB EMIRATES - JANUARY 30: Wayne Westner of South Africa plays his third shot at the par 4, 14th hole during the first round of the 2014 Omega Dubai Desert Classic on the Majlis Course at the Emirates Golf Club on January 30, 2014 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. (Photo by David Cannon/Getty Images) Two-time European Tour winner and Irish Open runner up Wayne Westner has died in a suspected suicide in South Africa, local police said on Wednesday.
